name: Su Ejderi Sürüsü
desc:
Güçlü bir Su Ejderi grubu.

Enkanomiya halkı tarafından özel olarak üretilip seçildikleri için olağanüstü güçlüler. Tabii ki hiçbir Ejder bunun için minnettarlık duyacak değil.

Bu sürünün en kuvvetli üyeleri farklı elementleri kullanabiliyor.

Bunu nefretlerinin bir simgesi olarak kullanıyorlar.

customize.text: Dainchi Mikoshi Işınlanma Portalı'na ışınlandıktan sonra hemen ilerideki binaya doğru ilerleyin.
Binanın içine ulaştığınızda, gözüken delikten içeriye atlayın. Savaş Alanına ulaşacaksınız.

customize.name: Buzkıran Su Ejderi
customize.desc:
A vishap that dwells deep beneath the oceans. Due to certain social adaptations, it has manifested a form aligned with the Cryo element.
The coming of humans sparked a conflict and a resultant evolution within the Bathysmal Vishaps, just as ants might divide up labor and biological characteristics, thus appearing in different forms. These vishaps are stronger than their ordinary kin.

customize.name: Yıldırımyutan Su Ejderi
customize.desc:
A vishap that dwells deep beneath the oceans. Due to certain social adaptations, it has manifested a form aligned with the Electro element.
Following the fading of the Seven Sovereigns' power, a new generation of Sovereigns is presently being born. But now that the Bathysmal Vishaps have evolved in this manner, they have lost their purity. As such, the Dragon of Water will no longer be born from among their ranks. Prophecy holds that the new Dragon of Water will definitely descend in the form of a human.

customize.text: 'nden oluşan bir düşmandır. Saldırıları, karakterlerin <color=#ffd780>Enerjilerini ve Dayanıklılıklarını</color> azaltmak üzere yaparlar. <color=#99ffff>Buz</color> <color=#ffffff73>ve</color> <color=#ffacff>Elektrik</color> <color=#ffffffd9>Hasarı</color> <color=#ffffff73>verirler.</color>

customize.text: sersemler ve saldırılara açık hale gelir. Bu durumu avantajına kullan!
• Eğer Su Ejderlerinden birinin Can seviyesi 0'a düşerse ve diğeri hala Canlı ise, Savaş Alanının ortasında birleşerek koordine bir saldırıya başlarlar. İki Su Ejderi de ölmedikçe savaş bitmez.

dropMaterial.name: Ejder Varisinin Sahte Yüzgeci
dropMaterial.desc:
A piece of biological tissue that you found after defeating the Bathysmal Vishaps.
Although it looks like a fin of some kind, it does not actually have any function at all.
The people of Byakuyakoku once investigated the Bathysmal Vishaps quite deeply. Their most distinctive feature was the ability to choose what traits it wished to pass on to its offspring. Because of their great hatred for humanity, these vishaps will lose any visual acuity by the time they reach maturity. At the same time, they have also evolved a certain degree of elemental polymorphism for combat purposes.

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Yeşimi Parçası
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."
"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Yeşimi Külçesi
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Ametisti Kırıntısı
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Ametisti Parçası
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
It should hold absolute control over this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Ametisti Külçesi
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"
